oai_dc:dc.dc:title: CONSTITUENT TRANSPORT IN ESTUARIES
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Glenne, Bard
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: estuary
transport in estuaries
sediment transport
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: During the last two decades considerable progress has been made in analyzing the diffusion process in estuaries. Unfortunately, certain difficulties (e g prediction of diffusion coefficients) still prevent common application of the diffusion method An old technique, related to the diffusion concept, can however, frequently give useful information regarding constituent mixing and transport velocities in natural estuaries.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 11 (1968): Proceedings of 11th Conference on Coastal Engineering, London, United Kingdom, 1968.; 86
